IdeoPresetDef.label: xeno fanatics
IdeoPresetDef.description: There is no place in the world for anything other than humanity and its endless incarnations.\n\n<color=#f5ffa2>Gameplay Effects:</color> Guarantees <color=#ff8585>debuffs</color> for using any animals, mechanoids and some mutants.

IdeoPresetDef.label: deathwatch
IdeoPresetDef.description: Our sleep is the only reality worthy of protection.\n\n<color=#f5ffa2>Gameplay Effects:</color> Deathrest solo. Colonists must work in shifts, while everyone sleeps one of the pawns is awake. Animals, mechs and some mutants are also allowed.

IdeoPresetDef.label: blood family
IdeoPresetDef.description: In such difficult times, only blood relatives can be trusted, and only by building strong relationships between generations will we be able to survive.\n\n<color=#f5ffa2>Gameplay Effects:</color> Family only run. Pawns without blood relation are subject to penalties. Quest pawns, slaves and prisoners are ignored.

IdeoPresetDef.label: duplicators
IdeoPresetDef.description: There are many of us, we are united in everything, in our origin, in our thoughts, weaknesses and strengths. We are me, and I am the legion.\n\n<color=#f5ffa2>Gameplay Effects:</color> Duplicates only. Use a Duplicator xenotype or create a custom one. An obelisk can also be used. Animals, mechs and some mutants are also allowed.

IdeoPresetDef.label: let me solo here
IdeoPresetDef.description: I don't need society, or unity, or a tame army. There are no obstacles that I can't overcome on my own.\n\n<color=#f5ffa2>Gameplay Effects:</color> True solo mode. All colonists above 1 and all non-humans give a stacking mood penalty. Prisoners and quest pawns are ignored. Use a strong xenotype to balance the difficulty, or start as a baseliner if you want hardcore.
